attributes.action: I call on all people who feel the badger cull is wrong to sign this e petition.
attributes.additional_details:
The Government have not recognized the important advice from its own Independent Expert Panel about the cull in 2013  or the Natural England Chief Scientific Adviser who called the badger cull an epic failure.

I call on all people who feel the badger cull is wrong to sign this e petition.

In supporting this e petition it would demonstrate to the Government that the policy to shoot and kill badgers is reckless and costly.
